Capstone Timeline

Capstone Timeline

Semester 2 (Spring)

  • Capstone adoption process begins - all students complete the capstone adoption web form

  • UP 510 Workshop assignments are shared by the department and the department enrolls students in their assigned UP 510 fall workshops

Semester 3 (Fall)

  • PDF capstone adoption form due for students petitioning onto the project or thesis pathways
  • Updated Plan of Study
  • Introduce capstone requirements including portfolio and poster requirements

Semester 4 (Spring)

  • Draft poster submission
  • Draft poster review session
  • Department awards ceremony and poster event (finals week)
  • Final exit deliverables due (finals week)

Key Dates for Spring 2026 Graduates

Key Capstone Dates Spring 2026
Date Deliverable Description
May 2, 2025 Complete capstone adoption web form

  • All second-semester MUP students will complete the capstone adoption web form to indicate their proposed capstone pathway and workshop preferences

  • The department’s graduate programs staff will automatically register you for your assigned UP 510 workshop courses for fall and spring.
March 2026 Draft Project / Thesis to Adviser
  • Students pursuing the Project or Thesis pathways submit a complete first draft of their capstones to their adviser for review and comments
April 2026 Draft Poster Submission

  • Submit your draft poster to the Box file dropbox below.

  • Submissions must follow this naming convention: LastName_FirstName_PosterDraft.pdf
April 2026 Draft Poster Review and Markup
  • The poster review and markup will take place between 12:00 and 2:00 pm in TBH 227. Please have your poster pinned up in TBH 227 before 12:00 pm.
  • We will invite you and other students and faculty to provide feedback on your poster (12:00 – 2:00 pm). Please be prepared for your draft poster to be written on and marked up.
May 2026 Capstone Poster Presentations and Awards Ceremony
  • Time to celebrate your accomplishments! The Poster Presentations and Awards Ceremony is 5:00 - 7:00 PM in the TBH Blicharski Atrium. This is a public event and all are welcome to attend.
  • Please print a copy of your final polished poster and pin it up in the Blicharski Atrium between 2:00 pm and 4:30 pm.
  • Event starts at 5:00 PM
  • Awards Ceremony 5:00 PM - 5:30 PM
  • 5:30 PM - 7:00 PM Talk about and share your work with our broader departmental community, local practitioners, faculty, and alumni.
May 2026 Capstone Submission Deadline
  • Upload your final capstone deliverables including adviser signature before this date (more details below).
